## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G18290](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G18290)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>KAT2</u>
- **Gene Name:** potassium channel in Arabidopsis thaliana 2
- **Description:**   potassium channel KAT1-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2005531
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
